name: Emotional Gambler
description:
Your emotions are a slot machine, figure out to change your emotions to achieve life goals!

Misc.

  1. There's glass wine on the table, which boosts our confidence or makes your depressed randomly!
  2. You need to get 5 or more confident emotions to leave the room!
  3. The popup the shows up when you walk up to something is the minimum emotions needed to achieve it.

My first Ludum Dare submission, any feedback is appreciated! I just don't want to feel alone
